body: Is this that ghost chick that shows up while playing Pokemon Y or X when you walk into one of the buildings
She's so fucking cute. When she's so worried about her pussy and everything, I can't take it.
Why it says japanese when its english?
She came out around the WataMote craze, that's the only reason I can think off why. She's not even a new design for npc trainers, the crazy eyed ghost trainers in Gen 3's Lavender town come to mind.
why do people like this crazy ghost chic so much
